Articles.Content:
You\'ve been put in control of Brickworld Spaceport and it\'s up to you to plan the mission, build the ship and push the boundaries of space for all of brickkind!

////////////////////////////////////////////////////

BrickMod v0.6 - Parts & Features:

-2x2 Nosecone

-4x4 Nosecone

-BrickPod

Acts as KSP default pod

-Radial Clockwise Thruster

-Radial Counterclockwise Thruster

Combine use of clockwise and counterclockwise thrusters for hovering

-Stack Decoupler

-Engine 2x2 Standard

-Engine 4x4 Large

-Solid Rocket

-Fuel Tank Standard

Can now surface attach

-Radial Decoupler

-Winglet

Fully functioning

Included BrickMod readme contains technical details and change log.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////

In the works for v0.7:

-geometry cleanup & merge to improve physics performance

-include Mesh files in release to reduce initial load time

-part balance more in line with vanilla

-radial parachute

-wings & winglets

-advancedSAS

Future Releases:

-landing legs

-2x2 radial extender

-2x2 stack decoupler

-2x2 fuel tank

-micro liquid engines

-ion drive

-solar panels

-4x4 SRBs

-small SRBs

-surface attach liquid rockets

-2x2 stripped cone parachute

-micro radial decoupler

Download BrickMod v0.6:

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/66999462/BrickMod_v0.6.rar

Mirror:

https://rapidshare.com/files/479466778/BrickMod_v0.6.rar

Please PM me if the link goes down and I\'ll rehost ASAP!

LEGO ROCKETS.

AWESOME!

I didn\'t think that I would ever be flying a rocket made of lego in a game

Oh my word!

Simply brilliant!

That, my friend, is epic.

Do they shatter into individual pieces upon crash?

Oh SNAP! These look awesome! Well done good sir. :thumbup:

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
MMMMM LEGO NOSTALGIA
NOW I CAN FINALLY LAUGH AND THROW MODELS INTO THINGS WITHOUT GETTING IN TROUBLE!

NOW I CAN FINALLY LAUGH AND THROW MODELS INTO THINGS WITHOUT GETTING IN TROUBLE!

This. I will let my brother play only to manually crash the ship, and laugh at him.

Clicked on the spoiler thinking 'Well that doesn\'t sound like it would look too good.'.

OH MY GOD IT\'S AWESOME.
Lovely! Dissapointed to see you still have the standard command pod though. Would love a command pod like that!
Use the 4x4 cone for the command pod, that will keep it in theme.
I salute you. You are a wonderful person for doing this.
I support Lego mods.

Requests/Suggestions:

2x2x1 Nosecone with parachute, for detachable parts. I recommend using the Estes Parachute canopy (with credit, obv.), as it keeps with the \'toys\' style

http://www.findmybrick.com/images/P1120716.jpg

http://www.kerbalspacerepository.com/2011/08/13/estes-model-rocket-parachutes-1-2-2/

CM replacement model +texture, 2x2 dome, ideally just the pair of windows as the texture

Corresponding with that, a parachute for the CM (1x1 plate), also Estes Para canopy

http://www.findmybrick.com/images/ga4231.png

SAS Module, using the Tuned SAS Pack\'s \'small blue\' tuning. You could have that one be entirely blue.

Color Differences, to distinguish between parts: fuel tanks could be white, boosters yellow, decouplers green, etc.

On that note; could you make a 2x2 plate vertical decoupler?

http://www.findmybrick.com/images/fdsafewerx10.PNG

Thanks for the great response everyone! I\'ll add to this mod as I have time.

Also, thanks for the suggestions semininja, I\'ll definitely take them into consideration for future updates.

Updates in the works:

-command pod

-4x4 nosecone

-2x2 nosecone

-wings

-4x4 stack decoupler

-2x2 stack decoupler

-mega engine

-ion drive

-solar panels

-surface attach fuel tanks

-4x4 SRBs

-small SRBs

-surface attach liquid rockets

-surface attach 'hover' and 'spin' thrusters/engines (vectored liquid rockets)

-2x2 stripped cone parachute
Can\'t Wait
BrickMod v0.6 is up!
Looks Great!
looks awesome

HUZZAH and good show! My favorite game just got a little better.

Time for some ... BRICKS .. IN .. SPAAAAAAAAAACE! :-[ 8) :\'(
We need a window to thow them at... Oh! Not that kind of bricks!
This is getting epic.
hey, could someone please upload the hover-thrusters on their own in a ZIP format?

hey, could someone please upload the hover-thrusters on their own in a ZIP format?

Is 600Kb too much to download? Get the pack and add only the parts you want from it; they\'re easily separated by individual folders.
no, I don\'t have WinRAR anymore, and I just want to trial the hover- thrusters.
